item.title: CVE-2023-27605|2024-08-02T12:16:35.927Z -- sajjad%20hossain -- wp%20reroute%20email
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Sajjad Hossain WP Reroute Email allows SQL Injection.This issue affects WP Reroute Email: from n/a through 1.4.6.
